document.full_text: luis castillo, who was released by the mets on friday, will have a chance to be the phillies' second baseman while chase utley recovers from a knee injury.
document.title: castillo close to deal with phillies
lines_and_colors: luis castillo, who was released by the mets on friday, will have a chance to be the phillies' second baseman while chase utley recovers from a knee injury.
